column4: hmm...well, hopefully someone will stop by with an answer on that one later :> in a more general sense, how is unity stability wise...i'm trying to decide whether or not to download ubuntu or kubuntu for my upcoming upgrade
if you dont like it use kde, xfce4, lxde, gnome2
i'm aware that there are other choices, yes :> i was just wondering how unity stacked up, never used it before
use a live-cd and find out
